## EditNormalStateComponent class

Component used for rendering edit normal state of select

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class EditNormalStateComponent implements EditNormalState, NgSelectPluginGeneric<EditNormalStateOptions>, OnDestroy 
```
